scripts.rebuild: cd ./src/v1/ && npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all && cd ../.. && nodemon index.js
scripts.dev: cd ./src/v1/ && npx sequelize db:migrate && cd ../.. && nodemon index.js
scripts.start: cd ./src/v1/ && npx sequelize db:migrate && cd ../.. && node index.js
